description: T1 (TPO 13 2005) Sycamore: Remove ivy; reduce overall crown by up to 30% or 2.5 metres and lateral growth by up to 2m; maintain evenand flowing canopy outline.T2 (TPO 13 2005) Mature Lime : Remove ivy to ground level; reduce upper canopy by up to 50% or 9m; remove all dead and defectivebranchwood.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: <p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">This permission shall expire after a period of two years from the date of this decision.</span><br></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In order that the Local Planning Authority can review any change in circumstances after this period and to avoid the accumulation of unimplemented permissions.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><br><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The tree works hereby approved shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the description on this notice of approval by a suitable qualified tree surgeon and in accordance with BS3998:2010 ‘Recommendations for tree works’ (or any standard that reproduces or replaces this standard).&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of visual amenity and good arboricultural practice, having regard to Policy LP51 in the Local Plan 2033 (adopted 2020).</span></p>
